Topic.Title: Wanted -  Writer(s) for a Noir style game being made in Unity

Posts.EditableText:
Greetings,
[Before starting - pardon me if I wasn't supposed to post this in general discussion forum; I am new on this site]
 
I am a Unity developer and artist currently working on noir themed game being developed in Unity3d. The Visual Novel-Isometric hybrid game is set in 1950s (noir theme, mafia story arc etc) and will feature wide choices (a general outline of the plot/choices was made with Twine 2). But Noir style writing is beyond my scope and I am looking for writers.
Writer(s) will have full creative freedom (obviously!) for plot/character re-development and improvement. Hobbyist and budding writers are all welcome for co-writing. I have experience with completing two games previously - a space shooter and a platformer and am looking for a reasonable time frame to finish this new project.
 Also, kindly provide link(s) to your works - published, ongoing project sample for a quick read.

My personal mail id is rakeshnair.engr@gmail.com
Awaiting an early response,
Regards,
Rakesh Nair
